parameters.name: App
parameters.description:
The name of the application that plays the output streams of the monitoring session.

You can specify a name. If you do not specify a name, the system uses **monitor** as the name of the application.

parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description: The endpoint of the monitoring session.

parameters.name: InputList
parameters.description: The list of monitored input streams. For more information, see the following table **InputConfig**.

parameters.name: MonitorName
parameters.description: The name of the monitoring session.

parameters.name: OutputTemplate
parameters.description:
The output template of the monitoring session. Valid values:

*   **lp_ld**: low definition.
*   **lp_sd**: standard definition.
*   **lp_hd**: high definition.
*   **lp_ud**: ultra high definition.

parameters.name: Stream
parameters.description: The name of the output stream of the monitoring session. If you do not specify a name, the system generates a name at random.
